channel.title: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase
channel.description:
Hello I need the help of the community to create a patch that does the same thing as this: http://archive.monome.org/community/discussion/13731/new-app-monolase-8-bit-modulated-delaysampler/p1
which is a emulation of the ciat lonbarde cocolase (delays with modulation)
any idea where I can start ?

item.title: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase
item.dc:creator: @BenFalsetown Falsetown
item.description:
@BenFalsetown wrote:

It looks gorgeous and thank you so much for building this

I'm a total noob, can you explain it to me (like I'm 5 years old ) how can I play with it ?

I launch the file and then what ? how can I produce sound with this beauty ?

thanks !

Read full topic
item.source: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase

item.source: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase

item.title: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

@BenFalsetown

I think it seems like a great project. I can definately help on the patching side and I dont mind doing that. Looks like something I'd like to play with myself.

But I have a hard time figuring out how the Sidrassi is actually build. How the oscillators/lfos are setup. I see how many oscs/lfoes there are, but exactly how it is set up, I havent figured out yet.... Guess we need to do some more research.

If you want to build the hardware stuff, you need to get help from someone more qualified in here. I dont know much about that. But there are many helpful souls in here, so I am sure someone can point you in the right direction.

Read full topic
item.source: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase

item.title: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase
item.dc:creator: @BenFalsetown Falsetown
item.description:
@BenFalsetown wrote:

it's a good news !

I have zero knowledge in Max/Msp or the axoloti so it will take me a lot of time

Read full topic
item.source: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase

item.title: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Hey @BenFalsetown

From scanning it quickly I don't see any problems in building something at least very similar, if not the exact same. Maybe you would need more than one Axoloti if you want to make it really complex.

I would start with the Sidrassi brain, the 5 oscillators(or lfo's).

And then next build the pitched delay lines.

Read full topic
item.source: Project to create a Ciat-Lonbarde cocolase/monolase
